group_1.textLeft: ...And so I decided that what @I needed to do was to get stronger...

group_1.textRight: Uhuh… I totally get you.
...I mean, I don't really get it, but...

group_1.textLeft: Wha—[chara:100301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]

group_1.textRight: But anyway, the bottom line is like, @ya wanna get stronger. Am I right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, pretty much...

group_1.textRight: This whole getting stronger thing...@I think I heard something about it once.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? How...?

group_1.textRight: You know. Like training, right?

group_1.textLeft: Training?@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]I mean, I've been practicing...

group_1.textRight: Practicing... That's just like, doing @stuff over and over again, right?

group_1.textLeft: Practice? Well, ummm, yeah...@I guess you're right...

group_1.textRight: (Actually, not really...)
But training, is like, way harder!@Am I right?
When you're done, like, you feel a @bajllion times stronger or something.
I read about it in a comic once.
On a super-hot day, it feels@good when you, like swim, right?
It's just like that!
(...I told her to try talking, but I don't @think this is gonna work for her...)

group_1.textLeft: I-I get it![chara:100301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]

group_1.textRight: (Wait, she got it?! It worked...@Wow, Emily is amazing...)

group_1.textLeft: You're right!@I have to push myself...to the limit!
In other words, I have to train by@myself, not with Rena and the others!
I haven't tried anything like that!
Emily!@No, I mean Emily-sensei!

group_1.textRight: Oh my god, stop the sensei thing.

group_1.textLeft: So specifically...@What should I do?

group_1.textRight: Specifically...?@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]Umm, Akira-chi!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Wh-what...?@(I got a bad feeling about this...)

group_1.textRight: Say...@What's your name again?

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno Yui!

group_1.textRight: Okay...Tsurupi.

group_1.textLeft: Tsurupi…[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.0][chara:100301:motion_101][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]s-sure!

group_1.textRight: This is Akira-chi.
I'm...Akira Shinobu.

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: Akira-chi helps me out here.

group_1.textLeft: It's nothing I actually offered to do...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, I heard she's like, super @awesome at karate or something.

group_1.textLeft: Karate?!@[chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Awesome?!
Well, no, I mean I do karate, but...

group_1.textRight: Seriously, Akira-chi, I heard there're @like, legends being written about you!

group_1.textLeft: What kind of legends?!@Come on now, don't say weird stuff!

group_1.textRight: Don't like, karate people train under some@super awesome ninja master or something?
Why don't you go train at Akira-chi's place?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hang on a second!@You can't just...!

group_1.textRight: Oh please accept me, [chara:100301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Akira-sensei!

group_1.textLeft: How did Emily convince you so fast?!
